Transportation.title: Tesla vet says that ‘reviewing real products’ — not mockups — is the key to staying innovative
Transportation.summary: “No slides was our first rule,” McNeil told the audience earlier this month at TC All Stage in Boston. “You have to be reviewing real product.”

Transportation.title: Tesla wants to bring robotaxis to San Francisco. Here’s what’s standing in the way.
Transportation.summary: There will be an employee in the driver's seat -- a big change from how things have been working in Austin.

Security.title: Allianz Life says ‘majority’ of customers’ personal data stolen in cyberattack
Security.summary: Exclusive: Allianz Life said the "majority" of its customers and employees had data stolen in the July cyberattack. The company said it has notified the FBI.

Security.title: Google took a month to shut down Catwatchful, a phone spyware operation hosted on its servers
Security.summary: Google has suspended the Firebase account of Catwatchful following a TechCrunch investigation. The spyware operation was caught using Google's own servers to host and run its surveillance app, which was stealthily monitoring thousands of people's phones.

Apps.title: Apple broadens App Store’s age-rating system
Apps.summary: Apple has expanded its age-rating system to include 13+, 16+, and 18+ ratings, in addition to the existing ratings for younger users.

Apps.title: Google is testing a vibe-coding app called Opal
Apps.summary: Google is testing a new vibe-coding tool called Opal, available in the U.S. through Google Labs, that lets users quickly spin up web apps with just a few prompts.

Apps.title: Sam Altman warns there’s no legal confidentiality when using ChatGPT as a therapist
Apps.summary: In response to a question about how AI works with today's legal system, Altman said one of the problems of not yet having a legal or policy framework for AI is that there's no legal confidentiality for users' conversations.

Startups.title: Index Ventures’ Jahanvi Sardana shares the truth about TAM and what founders should focus on instead
Startups.summary: Index Ventures partner Jahanvi Sardana has a reminder for all those founders worried about finding TAM for their product or service: many startups have emerged from markets that, at the time, were essentially nonexistent.

Startups.title: How a Y Combinator food-delivery app used TikTok to soar in the App Store
Startups.summary: BiteSight is a food-delivery app that lets users watch videos of food before ordering. It also lets customers see what their friends have ordered and bookmark places to try out.
